title: More DRYing up the test suite
body: I have found more spots in the test suite that could have been "DRYed" up.

comments_inline.body:
# [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pallets/flask/pull/2325?src=pr&el=h1) Report

> The diff coverage is `98.86%`.

[![Impacted file tree graph](https://codecov.io/gh/pallets/flask/pull/2325/graphs/tree.svg?width=650&src=pr&token=Hvz3ovjQ9i&height=150)](https://codecov.io/gh/pallets/flask/pull/2325?src=pr&el=tree)

==========================================

==========================================

  Branches      496      496              
==========================================
- Hits         5959     5877      -82     
- Misses        333      335       +2     
- Partials      119      121       +2
